name: ZMinecraft
description:
If you have the .minecraft folder and you don't want to lose your worlds, texture packs, make a backup.

Otherwise the game will replace the folder for the new files!

Now, you can play Minecraft in your browser!

If the game does not work do the following:

In Microsoft Edge:

Turn on Internet Explorer mode

In other Chromium-based browsers:

Install the IE Tab extension

IE Tab (Chrome Web Store)

Featured Servers:

ZMinecraft Official Server

46.4.71.235:62417

Old IP: playscraft.ga

StereoCraft 

stereocraft.ml


To play the game you need Java 7

 

 

To solve the sound problem download this file

Download Sounds

For the Web Version

Move it to %APPDATA%\.minecraft\

For the Desktop Version

Move it to (Game Folder)\files\minecraft\.minecraft\
